column2: Patient ID number randomly assigned to each patient prior to anonymizing the DICOM PHI tag (0010,0020)

ECOG Performance status scale - assessment of patient's functional status;GRADE	ECOG PERFORMANCE STATUS
0= Fully active, able to carry on all pre-disease performance without restriction
1=Restricted in physically strenuous activity but ambulatory and able to carry out work of a light or sedentary nature, e.g., light house work, office work
2=Ambulatory and capable of all selfcare but unable to carry out any work activities; up and about more than 50% of waking hours
3=Capable of only limited selfcare; confined to bed or chair more than 50% of waking hours
4=Completely disabled; cannot carry on any selfcare; totally confined to bed or chair
5=Dead
Number of packs smoked in a year
Smoking status at first consultation:Current smoker, ex-smoker, non-smoker
Tumor HPV status determined by p16 IHC +/- HPV DNA by PCR. Blank cell indicates no data available.
How the surgery, radiation, and chemotherapy are combined - see mapping terminology
Yes=received concurrent chemoradiotherapy, none=did not receive concurrent chemoradiotherapy
Date of first radiotherapy fraction, with date offset applied
Total RT dose delivered during radiotherapy.
Most recent date of contact at which clinical outcomes were updated or date of death, with date offset applied.
Binary indicator of vital status at last contact date.
Duration of follow up from diagnosis to last contact date in years.
Date of death, with date offset applied
Binary indicator of second cancer diagnosis
Date of second cancer diagnosis (if applicable)
training=training subset of RADCURE-challenge, test=heldout validation set of the RADCURE-challenge, 0=not in the RADCURE-challenge
